        Description copied from interface: PDFView
        start find operation.
        Specified by:
        viewFind in interface PDFView
        Parameters:
        dir - dir < 0 means backward, dir > 0 means forward.
        Returns:
        -1 means no more found, 0 means found, 1 means pending operations.
        in pending mode: find returned when PDFViewListener.onFound fired.
